I have a ration of this torrent of 3.1 and I'm only seeding. over 2000 peers, And I don't receive any byte, for days 47%. What is wrong with this torrent??????

pandit: it sounds like something is wrong with your torrent client.  Reporting over 2000 peers?  That is definitely wrong.  I would delete your current torrent and try downloading again.  And perhaps use a different client.  Are you using uTorrent?  I use that and have never had a problem.

Is it possible to get you to reupload the last 3 episodes of this. I tried redownloading, playing on different players and anything I could think of. There is either no sound on one player, or the sound and video is off.
All seasons and episodes with PERFECT quality so far...going for 4th season...thank you very much :)
No audio in the last 3 episodes. Tried several SW players on 3 operating systems. Also on two HW players. Nothing works. Same problem on Season 5 from episode 13-22.
I solved the audio mystery. The Matroska container is damaged. Solution: ffmpeg -i damaged.mkv -vcodec copy -acodec ac3 -ab 192k -scodec copy new.mkv
